The yield levels indicate a preference for shorter maturities as they are less sensitive to interest rate changes, while longer maturities may face headwinds from higher yields and negative momentum.

instruments.rationale: Stable EFFR and declining VIX suggest a risk-on sentiment, favoring short-term treasuries.
With VIX decreasing and stable macro indicators, 1-3 year treasuries are likely to benefit from a risk-on environment.
Moderate risk sentiment and stable yields suggest slight outperformance for medium-term treasuries.
Stable yields with a slight risk-on sentiment may lead to marginal gains in the 7-10 year segment.
Longer-term treasuries may see limited movement due to stable macro indicators and risk sentiment.
Given the current macro environment, long-duration treasuries are expected to perform in line with the baseline.
